com.ibm.team.workitem.common

Interface ILinkConfigurationContext


  • public interface ILinkConfigurationContext
    An object use to retain global configuration mapping context while processing multiple links. The context is intended to optimize link resolution performance by minimizing redundant service calls during batch link resolution.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean containsLinkTypeId(java.lang.String linkTypeId) 
      java.lang.String getConfigurationManagementUriForWorkItemByLinkType(IWorkItem workItem, java.lang.String linkTypeId) 
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMappedConfigurationManagementAttributeNames() 
      boolean hasVersionedLinks() 

    • Method Detail

      • containsLinkTypeId

        boolean containsLinkTypeId(java.lang.String linkTypeId)
        Parameters:
        linkTypeId -
        Returns:
        true if the context includes a mapping for the link type with id linkTypeId

      • getConfigurationManagementUriForWorkItemByLinkType

        java.lang.String getConfigurationManagementUriForWorkItemByLinkType(IWorkItem workItem,
                                                                  java.lang.String linkTypeId)
                                                                    throws TeamRepositoryException
        Parameters:
        workItem -
        linkTypeId -
        workItemServer -
        Returns:
        the global configuration URI associated with the passed workItem for links of type linkTypeId.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException

      • getMappedConfigurationManagementAttributeNames

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMappedConfigurationManagementAttributeNames()
        Returns:
        a List of unique attribute names that are required to resolve global configurations for the context.

      • hasVersionedLinks

        boolean hasVersionedLinks()
        Returns:
        true if this context includes link types for versionable resources.
